5ca550af-d285-4abb-9846-5b18e80d11a6.name: deployment_environment
5ca550af-d285-4abb-9846-5b18e80d11a6.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'deployment_environment') AS deployment_environment
FROM signoz_metrics.time_series_v4_1day
WHERE (metric_name = 'signoz_calls_total') AND (unix_milli >= (toUnixTimestamp(now() - toIntervalDay(1)) * 1000))
GROUP BY deployment_environment

d23168aa-b80c-4beb-83ce-96d4e7ba0719.description: The service.name value for the application
d23168aa-b80c-4beb-83ce-96d4e7ba0719.name: service_name
d23168aa-b80c-4beb-83ce-96d4e7ba0719.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'service_name') AS service_name
FROM signoz_metrics.time_series_v4_1day
WHERE (metric_name = 'signoz_calls_total') AND JSONExtractString(labels, 'deployment_environment') = {{.deployment_environment}} AND (unix_milli >= (toUnixTimestamp(now() - toIntervalDay(1)) * 1000))
GROUP BY service_name
